grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 尽力【ジンリョク】efforts, exertion, endeavour, assistance, services
理不尽【リフジン】unreasonable, irrational, outrageous, absurd
縦横無尽【ジュウオウムジン】freely, right and left, as one pleases
kun reading compounds: 尽きる【つきる】to be used up, to be run out, to be exhausted, to be consumed, to come to an end
尽くす【つくす】to exhaust, to run out, to devote, to serve (a person), to befriend, to do to exhaustion
尽かす【つかす】to use completely, to use up, to exhaust, to exhaust somebody's civility, to give up (on someone)
